posts.post_content:
Hey all, 
Need to unload my dupes.  Lots of PB backs.  Contact me via email or PM.  

[url]thauswirth01@sbcglobal.net[/url]

First come, first serve.
PP gift or money owed, or check or MO.

Prices include shipping and the more you get, the better the deal.  :)


Ill post up some scans tomorrow.  In the meantime, contact me with requests for scans of any specific cards your interested in.

Thanks Net 54!

I have interest in all of these if still available.

Note: I am only willing to pay through paypal, no gift.  I have been torched really bad in the past and I will no longer pay anyone I do not know unless I have protection.  No offense to you, I am sure you are honest, but I simply will never send paypal gift, MO or check for cards.

I'll split the paypal fees with you as your prices are fair, so add half the fees on your end to your total.  email [url]tps_lewis@comcast.net[/url] if you still have these, and thanks for understanding!

Bump for updates and price drop....

Thanks Net54!!
PM sent on the Egan.  Thanks!

got my cards, thanks!

Is there a feedback system here?

I did receive my cards fast and easy.  Good seller, thanks! :)
Received the Egan today.  Thanks for the fast service!

Figured Id bump this one more time before Ebay.  LOL.

If anyone tried to contact me recently, my computer was down for a few days, so I apologize if I missed your email.

Thanks guys and Net54!
